pull_requests.title: ci: update github actions checkout version
pull_requests.body:
See https://github.com/actions/checkout/releases/tag/v5.0.0

The v5 release updates it to use node.js 24 instead of 20.

Inspired by https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/33171 by @hebasto.

pull_requests.title: BIP-0388: fix typos and wording
pull_requests.body:
- Fixed typo in invalid examples: "Solved cardinality" → "Allowed cardinality".
- Removed unnecessary comma in "limited RAM and computational power".
- Changed "per the screen" → "on the screen" for clarity.
- Corrected "composed by" → "composed of".

pull_requests.title: BIP-0443: fix grammar, wording, and clarity improvements
pull_requests.body:
- Clarified `<pk>` replacement rule: now specifies "minimally encoded 0" instead of just "0".
- Fixed grammar in phrases (`semantic` → `semantics`, `value` → `values`).
- Corrected sentence structure ("allow to commit" → "allow to committing").
- Minor variable name fix in pseudocode (`input` → `inputs`).

comment_list.body: Took some of this, cherry-picked into #1998 (thanks!)

pull_requests.title: BIP374: in tests, pass message when verifying proof with message
pull_requests.body:
Ensure consistency by passing m=message when verifying a tampered proof
Strengthens the test to match the proof generation context
No behavior change expected; tests pass locally
